title: Smart Data Models - WasteObserved.
description: This entity models a single collection of Waste.***gaan we hier actoren ook benoemen?

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be WasteObserved

location.description: Location of the waste. Mandatory if address is not used. Geoproperty. Geojson reference to the item. It can be Point, LineString, Polygon, MultiPoint, MultiLineString or MultiPolygoProperty.

address.description: The mailing address. Mandatory if location is not used.  Model:'https://schema.org/address

dateObserved.description: Time of the wastecollection in ISO8601 UTCformat.

weight.description: The net weight of the collected waste. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](http://wiki.goodrelations-vocabulary.org/Documentation/UN/CEFACT_Common_Codes ) . For instance, 'KGM' represents kilogram.***moeten we hier bruto - netto - tarra hebben??

grossWeight.description: The gross weight of the collected waste. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](http://wiki.goodrelations-vocabulary.org/Documentation/UN/CEFACT_Common_Codes ) . For instance, 'KGM' represents kilogram.***moeten we hier bruto - netto - tarra hebben??

tareWeight.description: The tare weight of the collected waste. The unit code (text) is given using the [UN/CEFACT Common Codes](http://wiki.goodrelations-vocabulary.org/Documentation/UN/CEFACT_Common_Codes ) . For instance, 'KGM' represents kilogram.***moeten we hier bruto - netto - tarra hebben??

refGarbageTruck.description: A reference to an Vehicle Smart model referencint the vehicle used during garbage collection

refWeighingDevice.description: A reference to the device used to measure the waste weight.

refServiceOrderId.description: A reference to an external system containing workorders. This might contain data about a client requesting the garbage collection, or a workorder for wastecollection, or any other relavant referece.

Image.description: An URL to an image or images of the observed Waste.
